verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%> upon <S%H4192%H1121>Muth-labben<s%>, A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, with my whole <S%H3820>heart<s%>; I will shew <S%H5608>forth<s%> all thy marvellous <S%H6381>works<s%>.
I will be <S%H8055>glad<s%> and <S%H5970>rejoice<s%> in thee: I will sing <S%H2167>praise<s%> to thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, O thou most <S%H5945>High<s%>.
When mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> are <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H268>back<s%>, they shall <S%H3782>fall<s%> and <S%H6>perish<s%> at thy <S%H6440>presence<s%>.
For thou hast <S%H6213>maintained<s%> my <S%H4941>right<s%> and my <S%H1779>cause<s%>; thou <S%H3427>satest<s%> in the <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H8199>judging<s%> <S%H6664>right<s%>.

Thou hast <S%H1605>rebuked<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, thou hast <S%H6>destroyed<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, thou hast put <S%H4229>out<s%> their <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever<s%>.

O thou <S%H341>enemy<s%>, <S%H2723>destructions<s%> are come to a <S%H5331>perpetual<s%> <S%H8552>end<s%>: and thou hast <S%H5428>destroyed<s%> <S%H6145%H5892>cities<s%>; their <S%H2143>memorial<s%> is <S%H6>perished<s%> with <S%H1992>them<s%>.
But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H3427>endure<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: he hath <S%H3559>prepared<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment<s%>.
And he shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, he shall minister <S%H1777>judgment<s%> to the <S%H3816>people<s%> in <S%H4339>uprightness<s%>.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> also will be a <S%H4869>refuge<s%> for the <S%H1790>oppressed<s%>, a <S%H4869>refuge<s%> in <S%H6256>times<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>.
And they that <S%H3045>know<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%> will put their <S%H982>trust<s%> in thee: for thou, <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, hast not <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> them that <S%H1875>seek<s%> thee.
Sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%>: <S%H5046>declare<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%> his <S%H5949>doings<s%>.
When he maketh <S%H1875>inquisition<s%> for <S%H1818>blood<s%>, he <S%H2142>remembereth<s%> them: he <S%H7911>forgetteth<s%> not the <S%H6818>cry<s%> of the <S%H6035%H6041>humble<s%>.

Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> upon me, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; <S%H7200>consider<s%> my <S%H6040>trouble<s%> which I suffer of them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me, thou that liftest me <S%H7311>up<s%> from the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%>:
That I may shew <S%H5608>forth<s%> all thy <S%H8416>praise<s%> in the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>: I will <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in thy <S%H3444>salvation<s%>.

The <S%H1471>heathen<s%> are sunk <S%H2883>down<s%> in the <S%H7845>pit<s%> that they <S%H6213>made<s%>: in the <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H2098>which<s%> they <S%H2934>hid<s%> is their own <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H3920>taken<s%>.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H3045>known<s%> by the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> which he <S%H6213>executeth<s%>: the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H5367>snared<s%> in the <S%H6467>work<s%> of his own <S%H3709>hands<s%>. <S%H1902>Higgaion<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be <S%H7725>turned<s%> into <S%H7585>hell<s%>, and all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H7913>forget<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>.
For the <S%H34>needy<s%> shall not <S%H5331>alway<s%> be <S%H7911>forgotten<s%>: the <S%H8615>expectation<s%> of the <S%H6041%H6035>poor<s%> shall not <S%H6>perish<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>.
<S%H6965>Arise<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; let not <S%H582>man<s%> <S%H5810>prevail<s%>: let the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> be <S%H8199>judged<s%> in thy <S%H6440>sight<s%>.
<S%H7896>Put<s%> them in <S%H4172%H4172>fear<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: that the <S%H1471>nations<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> themselves to be but <S%H582>men<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
